results.noResultsDescription: Try using fewer filters or start a new matching
results.noResultsWithFilters: We couldn't find anyone with these criteria:

meta.title: Therapist Matching - Find Your Perfect Therapist
meta.description: Find your ideal therapist through our guided matching system tailored to your individual needs.

wizard.step2Subtitle: These details help us find the right therapists for you
wizard.step3Title: Would you like to be more specific?
wizard.step3Subtitle: Optional details for even better results
wizard.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one topic
wizard.refinementOptional: These details are optional and can be skipped
wizard.subtopicHint: Select specific areas for better results
wizard.subtopicBenefit: The more specific you are, the better your therapist recommendations
wizard.customSubtopicPrompt: Nothing fits? Describe it in your own words
wizard.customSubtopicPlaceholder: e.g. I have trouble controlling my impulses during anger outbursts...
wizard.aiMatchLowHint: You can still continue - therapists with related specializations will be prioritized
wizard.customIntensityPrompt: Prefer to describe in your own words?
wizard.customIntensityPlaceholder: e.g. It strongly affects my daily life, I can barely work anymore...

screening.title: Quick Safety Check
screening.subtitle: Before we begin, we want to ensure we can offer you the right support.
screening.notice: Your answers are not stored and are only used to provide you with the best help.
screening.question1: Are you currently having thoughts of hurting yourself or taking your life?
screening.question2: In the past 2 weeks, have you thought that it would be better if you were no longer alive?
screening.canProceed: Thank you. You can now continue with the matching.
screening.crisisDetected: We want to connect you with immediate help.

crisis.title: You Are Not Alone
crisis.subtitle: It takes courage to be here. There are people who can help you.
crisis.immediateHelp: Please reach out to a crisis hotline now.
crisis.notAlone: Trained counselors are available around the clock.
crisis.additionalInfo: These services are free and anonymous. You can call anytime.
crisis.alternativeText: When you feel better, you can return anytime.

intensity.title: How much is this affecting you?
intensity.subtitle: Check what applies to you. This helps us find experienced therapists.
intensity.optional: These details are optional and can be skipped.

depression.daily: I feel sad or empty almost every day
depression.sleep: My sleep is significantly disrupted (too much or too little)
depression.work: I can barely manage my work or daily activities
depression.isolation: I withdraw from friends and family
depression.hopeless: I see little hope for the future

anxiety.daily: I have anxiety feelings almost every day
anxiety.avoid: I avoid certain situations because of my anxiety
anxiety.physical: I have physical symptoms like racing heart or sweating
anxiety.work: My anxiety significantly limits my daily life

family.daily: Family conflicts burden me almost daily
family.communication: Communication in my family is very difficult
family.avoidance: I avoid contact with certain family members
family.children: The situation also affects my children or other family members

relationships.daily: Relationship problems occupy me almost daily
relationships.communication: We have communication problems in the relationship
relationships.separation: I'm thinking about separation or going through one

burnout.exhausted: I feel permanently exhausted, even after rest
burnout.cynical: I have an increasingly cynical attitude toward my work
burnout.physical: I have physical complaints due to stress
burnout.weekend: Even on weekends, I can't really switch off anymore

trauma.flashbacks: I have flashbacks or intrusive memories
trauma.avoid: I avoid places, people, or situations that remind me
trauma.sleep: I have nightmares or sleep problems because of what happened
trauma.trust: I have difficulty trusting other people
trauma.daily: What I experienced strongly affects my daily life

addiction.control: I feel like I'm losing control over my behavior
addiction.daily: I think about it daily or do it daily
addiction.withdrawal: I have withdrawal symptoms when I stop
addiction.hide: I hide my behavior from others

eating.thoughts: Thoughts about food or weight constantly occupy me
eating.control: I feel like I can't control my eating behavior
eating.physical: I have physical complaints due to my eating behavior

adhd.organize: Organization and planning are very difficult for me
adhd.impulsive: I often act impulsively and regret it later
adhd.work: My concentration problems affect my work

selfcare.neglect: I often neglect my own needs

stress.control: I feel helplessly at the mercy of my stress

sleep.falling: It takes me a long time to fall asleep
sleep.staying: I often wake up during the night
sleep.daily: My sleep problems affect my daily life
sleep.medication: I take medication or substances to fall asleep

quiz.title: How do you want to work?
quiz.subtitle: Help us find your ideal therapy style

communication.question: How should your therapist work with you?

homework.question: Do you want to do exercises between sessions?
homework.yes: Yes, I want to actively work on myself
homework.no: No, I prefer everything in the session

talk.question: How do you want to communicate in sessions?
talk.moreSelf: I want to talk a lot myself

location.hint: We detect your location automatically or you can enter a city

results.title: Your Matches
results.topMatchesSubtitle: Based on your preferences, we found these therapists for you
results.showMoreHint: View all other therapists, sorted by match score

freetext.title: Describe your situation
freetext.subtitle: In your own words: What's on your mind? We'll automatically identify relevant topics and focus areas.
freetext.placeholder: e.g. I've been feeling exhausted for weeks and everything feels overwhelming. My relationship is suffering...
freetext.example1: I've had sleep problems for months and feel exhausted during the day. Work is very stressful.
freetext.example2: After the breakup, it's hard to trust again. I keep thinking about the past.
freetext.example3: I have regular panic attacks, especially in social situations. It's limiting my life.

modeSelection.title: How would you like to start?
modeSelection.subtitle: Choose the mode that fits you best

quickMode.title: Find your therapist fast
quickMode.subtitle: 3 questions, instant results
quickMode.q2: How urgent is your need for help?

compare.title: Comparison
compare.hint: Tap the icon to compare therapists

personalized.experienceMatch: Has {years} years of experience with similar cases
personalized.methodMatch: Uses {method} – a proven method for your concern

transparency.title: Why this match?
transparency.howWeCalculate: How we calculate the match score
transparency.calcExplanation1: Our algorithm analyzes multiple factors to find the best fit:
transparency.calcFactor1: Specialization: Does the expertise match your topics?
transparency.calcFactor2: Experience: Does the therapist have experience with similar intensity?
transparency.calcFactor3: Practical criteria: Do location, insurance, and session type match?
transparency.calcFactor4: Profile quality: Is the profile complete and verified?
transparency.calcExplanation2: The more factors match, the higher the score. Therapists with higher scores appear higher.

howItWorks.title: How We Find Your Match
howItWorks.subtitle: A personal process in 5 steps

step1.title: You tell us about yourself
step1.description: What topics are you dealing with? What's weighing on you? Your answers stay confidential.

step2.title: We understand your needs
step2.description: Do you prefer an empathetic or direct style? Online or in-person? We listen carefully.

step3.title: We search our network
step3.description: Hundreds of qualified therapists with various specializations and experience levels.

step4.title: We calculate the fit
step4.description: Specialization, therapy style, experience and practical factors – we find who truly fits you.

step5.title: Your personal top matches
step5.description: The therapists with the highest compatibility, sorted by your individual fit.

howItWorks.closing: You're on the right path. The first step is often the most important.

feedback.title: How was your experience?
feedback.description: Your feedback helps us find better matches.
feedback.foundMatch: Did you find someone who fits you?
feedback.thankYouMessage: Your feedback helps us improve our service.
